'''''Minecraft Ã— Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds (Original Soundtrack)''''' is an {{w|extended play}} and the original soundtrack for the ''Minecraft'' pack in ''[[Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds]]''. It features compositions by [[Lena Raine]], [[Kumi Tanioka]], [[Aaron Cherof]], and [[Peter Hont]] remixed by Takahiro Kai. It was released on December 18, 2025.

== Trivia ==
* "Overworld Track" is a remix of "[[Comforting Memories]]" and "[[Infinite Amethyst]]".
* "Overworld Track (Final Lap)" is a remix of "[[Relic]]"
* "The Nether Track" is a remix of "[[Pigstep]]"
* "The End Track" is a remix of "[[Minecraft Dungeons: Echoing Void (Original Game Soundtrack)|Broken Heart of Ender]]"
